item.title: ETRN
item.description: score:17 Chances: The acquisition of Equitrans Midstream by EQT Corporation for $5.5 billion indicates a strategic move towards vertical integration in the natural gas sector. Equitrans is the majority owner of a pipeline situated in one of the fastest growing AI data center hubs.
